snippet: Thomas V. Dale, Nassau County’s police commissioner, stepped down Thursday after the county district attorney discovered behavior she characterized as “politically motivated policing.”
abstract: Nassau County Police Commissioner Thomas V Dale steps down after county District Attorney Kathleen M Rice finds he had intervened to order an arrest in politically charged case; Victor Politi, deputy county executive for public safety, has been appointed acting police commissioner.
lead_paragraph: Thomas V. Dale, Nassau County’s police commissioner, stepped down Thursday after the county district attorney discovered behavior she characterized as “politically motivated policing.”

headline.main: Nassau Police Leader Resigns After Inquiry Into an Arrest
headline.print_headline: Nassau Police Leader Resigns After Inquiry Into an Arrest
